parameters.name: Decompress
parameters.description:
Whether to decompress or not. Valid values:

- true: To decompress.
- false: Not to decompress.

parameters.name: DecompressMaxFileCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of files for decompression. The minimum value is 1, and the maximum value is 1000. If the decompression level exceeds the maximum, the decompression operation will be terminated, but the detection of decompressed files will not be affected.

parameters.name: DecompressMaxLayer
parameters.description: The maximum level of decompression when dealing with nested compressed files with multiple levels. The minimum value is 1, and the maximum value is 5. If the decompression level exceeds the maximum, the decompression operation will be terminated, but the detection of decompressed files will not be affected.

parameters.name: DownloadUrl
parameters.description: The URL that is used to download the file. You can specify this parameter to trigger file detection without the need to upload the file in advance.

parameters.name: HashKey
parameters.description: The identifier of the file. Only MD5 hash values are supported.

parameters.name: OssKey
parameters.description: The key of the file that is stored in the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket. You can call the [CreateFileDetectUploadUrl](~~CreateFileDetectUploadUrl~~) operation to query the keys of files.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the file. Valid values:

*   **0**: unknown files
*   **1**: binary files
*   **2**: webshell files
*   **4**: script files

>  If you do not know the type of the file, set this parameter to 0.
